content.text:
It looks like the Obsidian MCP server isn't currently running. The connection was refused on port 27124. 

To use the Obsidian tools, you'll need to:
1. Make sure Obsidian is open and running
2. Have the Obsidian MCP server properly configured and started

If you have the Obsidian MCP server set up, you can start it and try again. Otherwise, I can help you explore your file system using standard command-line tools if needed.
